request.description: Logout user (requires authentication)
Request password reset email
Reset password using token from email
Change password for authenticated user (requires authentication)
Get complete user profile information (requires authentication)
Get all departments with nested divisions and designations

query.description: ID of request type to exclude from results (optional)

request.description: Get all request types grouped by type, optionally excluding a specific request type (requires authentication)
Get list of work requests submitted by the authenticated user with filtering, pagination, and search (requires authentication)
Get details of a specific work request by ID, including all assigned tasks and their progress (requires authentication, user can only access their own requests)

formdata.description: JSON object containing output_devices and target_audience arrays for multi-selection

request.description: Create a new work request with optional file uploads (requires authentication)

item.name: Get Project Types by Request Type

query.description: Request type ID to get associated project types

request.description: Get list of project types associated with a specific request type via project_request_reference table (requires authentication)
Get available options for about_project field with output_devices and target_audience categories (requires authentication)

query.description: Filter by status (excludes draft by default)

request.description: Get all running work requests from users in the same division as the authenticated user, including complete task details (requires authentication)

item.name: Get Division Work Request by ID

request.description: Get a specific work request by ID from users in the same division as the authenticated user, including complete task details and documents (requires authentication, only accessible if work request belongs to same division)

query.description: Request type ID to get dashboard stats for

request.description: Get dashboard statistics for a specific request type including divisions linked to the request type, accepted+in_progress tasks count, accepted+in_progress projects count, upcoming deadlines count in the next 7 days, and creative manager information for divisions linked to that request type (requires authentication)
Get list of work requests assigned to the authenticated manager with filtering, pagination, and search (requires authentication and manager role)

item.name: Get Assigned Requests with Status Filter

query.description: Filter by status (pending, accepted, in_progress). If not provided, returns all requests. For in_progress, includes latestTaskDeadline field

request.description: Get work requests assigned to the authenticated manager with optional status filtering. For in_progress requests, includes the latest task deadline. Supports pagination, search, and filtering (requires authentication and manager role)

item.name: Get Assigned Work Request by ID

request.description: Get details of a specific work request assigned to the authenticated manager, including all tasks assigned to users for this work request (requires authentication and manager role)
Accept a work request assigned to the authenticated manager (requires authentication and manager role)

Defer a work request with reason (insufficient_details or incorrect_request_type). For insufficient_details, provide optional message. For incorrect_request_type, provide both new_request_type_id and new_project_type_id (requires authentication and manager role)
Update project_id and project_name for a work request assigned to the authenticated manager (requires authentication and manager role)
Delete a work request and all related data assigned to the authenticated manager (requires authentication and manager role)

item.name: Get Assignable Users for Work Request

request.description: Get list of users from the work request's division that can be assigned tasks (excludes managers, requires authentication and manager role)

item.name: Get Task Types for Work Request

query.description: Optional project ID to get task types directly (alternative to using work_request_id)

request.description: Get list of task types associated with the work request's project type or directly by project_id query parameter (requires authentication and manager role)
Get task analytics for a specific work request including total tasks, publish date, estimated TAT, team members, and SME request count (requires authentication and manager role)
Send task assignment notifications to users (requires authentication and manager role)
Get manager's team with task counts grouped by division (requires authentication and manager role)
Get tasks assigned to the manager themselves (requires authentication and manager role)
Create a new task (requires authentication and manager role)
Update a task by ID (requires authentication and manager role)
Delete a task by ID (requires authentication and manager role)
Review (approve/change_request) a task (requires authentication and manager role)
Get tasks for a specific work request (requires authentication and manager role)
Get tasks for a specific user with status filter and pagination (requires authentication and manager role)
Review (approve/change_request) a task document (requires authentication and manager role)
Review (approve/change_request) an issue document (requires authentication and manager role)
Get assigned tasks for division 9 users or managers (requires authentication)
Get in-progress tasks from user's division (only for division 9 users, requires authentication)
Get single task details by task ID (requires authentication)
Assign task to user (only for managers and super admins, requires authentication)
Accept a task and optionally set start_date (only if intimate_team = 1, requires authentication)
Submit a task with optional link and files (requires authentication)
Get all documents for a task (requires authentication)
Delete a document by ID (requires authentication)
Get project details data for admin panel (requires authentication)
Get task details data for admin panel (requires authentication)
Get tasks for a specific work request (requires authentication)
